Text: Plan Assessments as of for ETSAttached is the updated version of the plan assessments from Enron Net Works ENW for your business unit We are sending revisions due to several changes including increases in Corporate and other business unit allocations and reductions in ENW expenditures We will follow up next week with the breakout of each company This intercompany billing invoice now includes pass throughs and capital for your information Consistent with pass through billings long distance market data WAN etc will not be included in the standard assessments xxxxxxx accounts They will be posted directly to direct expenses accounts at the cost center level This pass through number is only a high level place holder and is not intended to replace the dollars already being budgeted for by each cost center owner If you have any questions you can contact Kevin May at x and he will answer any questions or direct you to the correct person If you are not the correct person to receive these assessments or if there is someone else that you would like to include in this process please reply back to me with this information and I will add them to the contact list for future correspondence Thanks Jay x
